description: Mountaineering performance for Alaska, Aconcagua, and the Canadian Rockies in winter. The Phantom 6000 are ready to go big.  Get a nimble, progressive fit with the quick-lace system using strong Dyneema cord. Keep your precious heat with the felt and 4mm-EVA inner boot. And get the streamlined performance of a leather boot with the multi-day versatility of a double boot.Gaiters are light and super tough Kevlar-reinforced Schoeller S-Tech Fabric.Gaiters feature Super Fabric with Outdry for weatherproof durability.Upper/shell is constructed from Cordura, EVA and cork for durable, lightweight warmth.Removable liner is made of Primaloft Micropile, EVA and cork to keep your feet toasty at altitude.Durable waterproof Flexseal® zipper closure eases access.Quick-lace system allows for easy tie-ins with cold or gloved fingers.Insole is made of carbon fibre and EVA for cushioned control.Microporous EVA midsoles are lightweight and absorb shock.Vibram Zero Gravity soles retain grip and sensitivity.Compatible with all crampon binding systems.
name: Scarpa Phantom 6000 Boots - Unisex
